from PIL import Image
import io

src = Image.open\('assets/keranosuke-icon-kabuki.png'\).convert\('RGBA'\)

# apple-touch-icon \(180x180\)
apple = src.resize\(\(180, 180\), Image.LANCZOS\)
apple.save\('assets/apple-touch-icon.png', 'PNG'\)
print\('apple-touch-icon.png created'\)

# favicon.ico \(multi-size: 16, 32, 48\)
sizes = [\(16,16\), \(32,32\), \(48,48\)]
ico_images = [src.resize\(s, Image.LANCZOS\) for s in sizes]
ico_images[0].save\('assets/favicon.ico', format='ICO', sizes=sizes\)
print\('favicon.ico created'\)

# favicon.svg - use 32x32 PNG as base64 embedded SVG
import base64
buf = io.BytesIO\(\)
src.resize\(\(32,32\), Image.LANCZOS\).save\(buf, 'PNG'\)
b64 = base64.b64encode\(buf.getvalue\(\)\).decode\(\)
svg = f'<svg xmlns=\\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\\" viewBox=\\"0 0 32 32\\"><image href=\\"data:image/png;base64,{b64}\\" width=\\"32\\" height=\\"32\\"/></svg>'
with open\('assets/favicon.svg', 'w'\) as f:
    f.write\(svg\)
print\('favicon.svg created'\)
